trans-unit.source: AI Suite license Key: Enter your generated API key or generate a new one under https://www.autodudes.de/
AI Suite server: Enter the server url to access the AI Suite server (default: https://api.autodudes.de/)
Store image and media files at this folder (e.g. /images/ai-images/subfolder). If the folder doesn't exist, it will be created.

Use always URL for metadata requests: With this option you can use the corresponding URL of the page for all metadata analyses. As a result, you have to use fewer tokens to carry out your corresponding analyses. IMPORTANT: The page must be publicly accessible (hidden pages fail and pages in a local environment lead to poor results)
Enter the ID of one page that is used as a detail view for news articles of the news extension
